BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor

Items.Title: Oversight - Support for New York City Worker Unionization Drives.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Support for New York City Worker Unionization Drives.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on Wendy’s to join the Fair Food Program and support farmworkers’ human rights.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Wendy’s to join the Fair Food Program and support farmworkers’ human rights.

Items.Title: Resolution expressing solidarity with unionization drives across New York City’s workforce and affirming the right to have union elections free from anti-democratic union-busting practices.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Expressing solidarity with unionization drives across New York City’s workforce and affirming the right to have union elections free from anti-democratic union-busting practices.
